name: JoJo's Bizarre Solitaire Collection
description:
Solitaire game based on "JoJo's Bizarre Adventure" by Hirohiko Araki.

Classic Mode: Standard Klondike gameplay, similar to that of Microsoft Solitaire.
Bizarre Mode: Choose from 4 members of the Joestar bloodline and gain power to use your abilities and accelerate gameplay.

Features soundtracks composed by Hayato Matsuo and Taku Iwasaki, taken from the popular anime series by David Production.

Note: Payments disabled as a precaution due to use of copyrighted content.
